parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The application ID. You can obtain the application ID on the Application Management page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: InstanceParameters
parameters.description: The dynamic parameter of the workflow instance. The value of the parameter can be up to 1,000 bytes in length.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace ID. You can obtain the namespace ID on the Namespace page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The source of the namespace. This parameter is required only for a special third party.
